Address: LOT 49 Woodridge Circuit Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
HALF ACRE BLOCK TITLING SOON!
One of Victoria's best kept secrets is this charming coastal town, Coronet Bay! It's a beautiful township situated approx. 1 ½ hour drive from Melbourne and overlooks Westernport Bay to Phillip Island & French Island. With a fantastic safe swimming beach this small town ticks all the boxes.
Lot 49 Woodridge Circuit is located in Coronet Bay's new estate just off the main entrance. Build your dream family home on a large 1/2 acre block of land and reap the rewards of your new lifestyle!
Due to be titled at the start of 2020, now is the time to make the Sea Change.
Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff – Bass Valley today 5678 8433!

Description:
BERMUDA BEND BEAUTY
Offered to the market for the first time in decades, this solid Cedar home presents a rare opportunity to purchase a much-loved property in a wonderful coastal setting.
This original character property represents a marvellous opportunity for a clever buyer to acquire a charming, well cared for, private home in the popular township of Coronet Bay. Featuring two storeys, the bottom level comprises 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom/ laundry, practical kitchen with electric cook-top and a large living zone with a deck which extends the space. The light filled top storey is the bedroom of choice and highlights wide views of Westernport Bay and capture a rural aspect as well.
Externally the property features ample parking and undercover space including a workshop to the rear. Many mature trees and plants, a designated vegetable garden and a generously sized fernery.
With its original character, the property can be used as an investment or to live in and renovate at the same time. To avoid missing out please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff today 5678 8433.

Description:
Loads Of Charm, Comfort & Great Location
This neat home has real charm and an amazing feel from the minute you walk in the front door. You can enjoy sitting in front of the wood heater on those cold winter days.
With just a short stroll to the magnificent beach that Coronet Bay has to offer in the warmer months. This home features 3 decent size bedrooms, split system air conditioning.
With the entertaining deck the flows from the kitchen/dining area. You can enjoy the comfort of this charming home.The property is fully fenced and offers peaceful enjoyment of pottering in the garden.
To view this home or for more information please do not hesitate to call Daniel or Tamara @realty today.

Description:
WALK TO THE BEACH - FROM YOUR NEW HOME
This spacious 3BR home has all you need for the family whether you are looking for a sea change an investment property or simply a holidayer by the beach this home should be on your to view list, approximately 500meters to the beach under cover parking and garage, large workshop plus a garden shed, it also features a galley style kitchen that flows into the dining area, floating floors and rumpus room.
3 - Generous size bedrooms
2 - Split System reverse cycle
Solar Panels and security shutters
2- Bathroom
2 - 4 Car off street parking
Low maintenance gardens
Very close proximity to Phillip Island, Coronet Bay is located on the Westernport waterline close to many different vineyards, cafes, farms selling fresh produce and dairy and many more activities for the family or simply relax and enjoy the quaint lifestyle.
For more information call Daniel or Tamara @realty

Description:
AFFORDABLE AND GREAT LOCATION CORONET BAY!!
This incredible family home is set in a quiet friendly neighbourhood of Coronet bay.
Set on a 534m2 ( approx. ) this neat and tidy two-bedroom house, in a peaceful location, will appeal to those looking to start living and loving the Coronet Bay community.
This is an excellent opportunity to renovate, extend to make it your dream home in a well- established and sought after locale.
The existing residence offers two generous bedrooms, a comfortable living zone, original yet functional kitchen with electric freestanding stove & oven, a central bathroom and separate laundry.
There is a great entertaining undercover deck at the back, with a double garage with power and fully fenced.
With so much potential to create something special, this property is perfectly positioned within close proximity to Coronet Bay Beach, the General Store and Pharmacy, Community Centre, and many other beautiful Bass Coast locations.
Call Daniel or Tamara to make an appointment to view this great property.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL BEACH HOME 33 BERMUDA BEND
Perfectly positioned to enjoy the stunning natural beauty for which Coronet Bay & Bass Coast is renowned for, this prime location offers a magnificent lifestyle, with the beach for the whole family to enjoy. The home features an open kitchen, open plan living and dining. 2 bathrooms one upstairs and one downstairs, and separate toilets.
3 good sized bedrooms; 2 upstairs, downstairs has the 3rd bedroom with a living area, and upstairs has a large entertainers deck.
While the home itself is located only 10 minutes from the Grantville shopping precinct which has all your needs accommodated. The region is rich with places to explore, including the award-winning Bass River Winery, Bassine Specialty Cheeses, local farmers markets and, of course, all there is to see and do in Phillip Island and along the popular Bass Coast.
Daniel & Tamara from @realty Bass Coast have the pleasure of presenting this exceptional property in Coronet Bay.

Description:
Lifestyle and Location
Immaculately presented double storey hardiplank residence, set in the increasingly popular bayside locale of Coronet Bay. The downstairs space offers a generous living/games room that has character filled slate floors which then flows out to an undercover entertainment area. Also downstairs is the laundry, a second toilet and shower.
Water views from the second level are enhanced by a semi-rural outlook and wonderful sunsets from the elevated deck. A spacious dining area, modern and user friendly kitchen and second living space surround another undercover deck, there are also three robed bedrooms. Three split systems and a wood heat ensure your comfort year-round.
Offering a host of additional features, including timber lined ceilings with exposed beams upstairs, floating floors, carport and a large workshop/shed.
Situated on a 534m2 approx fully fenced allotment with lovely established surrounds, the home is 400 metres from the beach and within walking distance of the cafe/restaurant and a short drive to La Provincia Winery.
Inspections by appointment only.
This property for Sale in Coronet Bay is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Classic Beach House On Huge Block
You won't buy better than this! In a popular seaside location, you'll be a stone's throw from the beach, boat ramp and recreation reserve. If you're in the market for a holiday home this is a great place to make your beachside escape, alternatively this would be an astute investment that will be popular with tenants.
Inside, find a home packed with features. Character timber floorboards are found throughout, easy to clean and a dream for those with allergies. A modern kitchen and updated bathroom make everyday living comfortable and effortless. Featuring oversized robed bedrooms and a light-filled north facing living room, there's a perfect balance of accommodation and living space.
Outside is a covered pergola that's perfect for year-round entertaining, and a generous backyard with great side access for a boat, caravan or trailer. A carport and extra shedding round out a complete package at an entry level price point.
Don't delay, book your inspection today!
This property for sale in Coronet Bay is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Address: 54 Champ Elysees Esplanade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
FAMILY HOME BY THE SEA
Situated in the tightly held marketplace of Champ Elysees Esplanade, Coronet Bay, this beautiful family home is within 100 metres of the waters edge!
Lovingly maintained, this home will welcome you like a warm hug. Entering the home you are greeted by an open plan living room which has a large wood heater, plenty of seating space and includes access into the private front court yard and also the well maintained backyard. The master bedroom with office/sitting room space, built in robes and direct access to the combined bathroom/laundry downstairs with separate toilet.
Heading up the central timber staircase, the natural light is abundant and draws you directly out to the upstairs deck which captures both water views and is enhanced by the surrounding mature tree foliage. A large updated kitchen with glass splashback and stainless steel appliances opens out to the meals and living space which is perfect for the growing family. Two further bedrooms are on offer upstairs and are serviced by the well fitted main bathroom which includes vanity, shower over bath and toilet.
To the rear of the home is a lovingly maintained garden with shaped lawn areas, remote control garage with workshop and extra height to store the boat or caravan. Plenty of off street parking is also on offer.
Conveniently located within a minute's walking distance to the safe sandy swimming beach of Coronet Bay, 50 metres from a bus stop and just across the road from the General Store with parkland and community centre nearby, this property shouts location, location and ticks all the boxes!
Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection 5678 8433.

Description:
EXQUISITE BEACH HOUSE
Wow, this home has been presented to a excellent standard offering the best in modern living. If you are looking for a low maintenance lifestyle with a fabulous outdoor entertaining area this home is perfect for you.
The central kitchen is bright, spacious and modern and forms the heart of the home, with spacious living and dining area & plenty of natural light. Featuring a huge covered entertainment area and landscaped yard/gardens.
When it comes to location, situated only approximately 400 meters to the beach this is hard to beat, Coronet Bay is known as a safe family orientated area close to schools, within walking distance to the local Cafe, General store & Beach , easy access to the highway if you are traveling to Melbourne and short drive to either Phillip Island or Inverloch Coronet Bay represents great value in a town known for its Beach life Style.
Features include:
- Modern quality kitchen with breakfast bar
- Large open living & dining area
- Entertainers covered alfresco
- Main bathroom has separate shower and bath & separate toilet
- Good sized family bedrooms all with built in robes
- Lock up garage with automatic door
- Off street driveway parking
- Fully fenced yard, great for kids and pets
- Modern Styled home
- Nothing left to do but move in and enjoy!
Call Daniel & Tamara today to arrange your inspection
Please Note: Photo ID is required for all inspections

Description:
SUPERB OPPORTUNITY TO SECURE A QUALITY FAMILY HOME IN PERFECT LOCATION
Superbly positioned just 800m approx. from the heart of the water foreshore. This stylishly family home offers a fantastic entry point into an increasing popular pocket of real estate. Fully fenced with landscaped and child friendly garden, the home interiors include quality fixtures and fittings. With abundant living and entertaining spaces indoors and out, this 534sqm approx. property presents exceptional potential for a young family, retirees or an investor.
Stepping through from your covered front deck with bistro blinds, you are enticed in to this modern space with high ceilings and windows to allow in natural light. The home offers open plan living, dinning and kitchen with floating floor boards, and has space to entertain all your family and friends alike. Beautifully presented three bedrooms BIRs carpet through out the bedrooms, share bathroom, separate laundry, wood fire, reverse cycle heating and cooling. large garage, and carport.

Address: 16 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
This neatly presented 3 bedroom 1 bathroom family home offers coastal living in the relaxed seaside town of Coronet Bay. The home is located approx. 800 metres from the safe sandy swimming beach and the Coronet Bay General Store.
The home is light filled with an open plan kitchen/living/dining zone situated to the front of the home. The three great size bedrooms include built in robes, ceiling fans and freshly cleaned carpet. A large separate laundry includes direct access down the side of the home. The family bathroom is complete with a bath, single shower and vanity – toilet is separate.
Outside there is a carport large enough to fit 2 cars, one in front of the other. A secure fully fenced back yard with a garden shed.
This property is ready to be enjoyed! Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott and Staff- Bass Valley to book your inspection.

Description:
IS THIS YOUR NEW HOME?
Ticking all the boxes as a first home, renovator and investment property! With solar power already installed, and being on one of the largest blocks available in central Coronet Bay, this is a MUST for your inspection list! This has to be the perfect home for someone who is searching for beach style living as a weekender, full time residence or investment. The home is located on a large 693m2 approx. block of land with a massive 28.5m frontage in a lovely quiet street only a short walk to the wonderful sandy beach, General Store and walking tracks that Coronet Bay has to offer.
It is neat and tidy with a bright and comfortable feel combined with an outdoor entertaining space an enclosed back yard which includes a garden shed and solar panels on the roof of the house. The bedrooms are a generous size with two out of the three having built in robes. Well-functioning bathroom featuring white tiles, separate laundry with direct access onto the backyard.
Open plan kitchen, dining and living area is a great useable space which is serviced by a split system and has access out to the undercover patio. Polished timber floorboards throughout and carpet in the bedrooms.
The double carport is adjoined to the house and is easily accessible. Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection!

Address: 8 Lorna Doone Drive Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
Beachside Budget Buying!
The Australian dream has always been to own a piece of Australia and call it home, closely followed by the quintessential beach-side holiday home which can be used for generations to come, then this classic home ticks all the boxes for a relaxed getaway at a very realistic price point.
Featuring an updated kitchen with huge caesarstone bench and quality appliances which overlooks the open living space with direct access to the wrap around verandah. The bathroom has also been brought into the 21st century with new vanity and shower, with both these prime cost items being recently improved all you need to do is invest in your own personal touches for your new beach retreat.
Positioned on 535m2 of easily maintained land, the property is a blank canvas outside with the added benefit of under-house access which can offer easy options to extend or create extra storage or living space if required. With fresh floor coverings and paint throughout, bring your furniture and settle in.
I have always had a rule that if i was to have a holiday house near the beach it would have to be close enough that i could walk back to grab another beer instead of relying on another Aussie icon, the esky and with 8 Lorna Doone Drive that certainly ticks that box with a comfortable 500m walk to the safe sandy swimming beach.
Coronet Bay is an ideal destination for those who enjoy fresh sea air, with access to a fantastic boat ramp for the fisher-people in the family as well as a general store which will cover all your immediate buying needs this hidden gem is on the verge of being discovered by those on the look out for affordable property in a relaxed environment.
Only 114km from Melbourne's CBD with Freeway basically the entire trip, this location is also only 35 minutes to the outer south eastern suburbs which allows easy access back to public transport if desired.
All in all a fantastic entry level opportunity with numerous options for habitation, from owner occupier or holiday retreat to a permanent or Airbandb styled lease, the choice is yours.
Insights: 8 Lorna Doone Drive, Coronet Bay VIC 3984 was last sold in 2019 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Coronet Bay have recently been sold.

Address: LOT 64 Bowline Court Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
STAGE 3 CORONET BAY ESTATE
Stage 3 Coronet Bay Estate, Bowline Court, Coronet Bay features 21 lots with a variety of Lot sizes ranging from 454m2 to 632m2.
On offer here is Lot 64 Bowline Court, Coronet Bay - situated on approximately 475 square metres, this parcel of land is on the Eastern side of the street and is brilliantly located a five minute walk to the safe, sandy swimming beach.
Coronet Bay offers the type of classic seaside lifestyle that many thought no longer existed. Be surrounded by the unspoilt tranquility of nature, yet, at only 20 minutes to Wonthaggi, 40 minutes to Pakenham and 80 minutes from the CBD, connected to everything you need.
Build your dream home and enjoy the lifestyle you've always wanted, at a fraction of the cost. Walking distance to the beach, local bus stop, community centre, basketball court, playground, bmx track and walking tracks.
Contact Kellie Morgan and the team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today on 0414 625 730 to arrange your inspection!
